DOC.brief_title: Intrauterine Human Chorionic Gonadotrophins ( hCG ) Endometrial Treg Cells
DOC.detailed_description: Aim work : To study effect intrauterine injection human chorionic gonadotrophin endometrial T regulatory cell ( Treg cell ) electromicroscopic endometrial characteristic . Background : It demonstrate regulatory T cell expand pregnancy present feto-maternal interface early stage pregnancy . Rational : Intrauterine injection hCG around time implantation may increase endometrial Treg cell improve implantation . Methods : Intrauterine injection 100 IU hCG do follow endometrial biopsy check Treg cell pinopodes .
